MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a fault with the power WA7 postcode area of Halton Lodge, affecting properties in Fenwick Lane, Budworth Close and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at  3:04PM. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of investigation needed to locate the cause of the fault and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10:00PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6:24PM on 13TH January 2021.
